1.title: Part 1
1.plot: Five R Trucks in Golden, CO is about to start the busiest three weeks of their year. With SEMA right around the corner, they have too many trucks to complete in too little time but there is always time to live The Lifted Life. The crew takes time to off-road at Colorado's notorious "Frame Twister."

2.title: Part 2
2.plot: It's nothing but 4x4 builds as the guys at Five R Trucks in Golden, Colorado are up against the clock to finish four truck builds in to showcase at the upcoming SEMA show in Las Vegas, Nevada. The crew hopes their big gamble pays off with a trifecta of Ford Super Duties and an ace up their sleeve with a 2016 GMC Denali Diesel.

3.title: Part 3
3.plot: It's seven trucks, a tired crew and gallons of coffee when the crew hits the road for SEMA. Five R Trucks in Golden, Colorado completes three weeks of around the clock 4x4 builds, load up the semi, and caravan to their biggest show of the year, in Las Vegas, Nevada.

4.title: SEMA VIP Tour
4.plot: After weeks of laborious preparation, the Five R Crew takes their act on the road and now it's showtime in Las Vegas! The expert craftsmen give an exclusive look into the automotive aftermarket industries most sought after event, SEMA. Check out some of the hottest trends in 4x4 products premiering at this industry-only annual event.

5.title: Seeing Stars
5.plot: The team at Five-R embark on a very special build for Denver Broncos linemen and Super Bowl 50 MVP, Von Miller. Von Miller has asked the shop to build a one of a kind trophy truck that he can auction off for his charity, Von's Vision. This is one ride that can not be missed!

imdb.plot outline: Welcome to The Lifted Life, where every episode we make lifted dreams into stunning 4X4 customization reality. These award winning rides are built by the Hill Family's internationally renowned, Five R Trucks. There's never a dull moment here at this innovative 40+ year Colorado family business. Each week you'll witness someone's dream 4x4 roll from rendering to spectacular reality.
imdb.title: The Lifted Life
plot: Welcome to _The Lifted Life_ (qv), where every episode we make lifted dreams into stunning 4X4 customization reality. These award winning rides are built by the Hill Family's internationally renowned, Five R Trucks. There's never a dull moment here at this innovative 40+ year Colorado family business. Each week you'll witness someone's dream 4x4 roll from rendering to spectacular reality.
synopsis: Welcome to The Lifted Life, where every week we make someone's lifted dreams into stunning 4X4 customization reality.These award winning rides are built by the Hill Family's internationally renowned, Five R Trucks. There's never a dull moment here at this innovative 40+ year Colorado family business.Sky high lifts, air ride suspensions, wheels & tires, performance mods, winches, bumpers, grilles, interior design, body, paint, wraps, coatings, and groundbreaking accessories, these master craftsmen do it all, and they do it big.Each week you'll witness someone's dream 4x4 roll from rendering to reality. Whether it be driving on smooth asphalt, climbing over rocky passes, or slopping through deep mud, we builds the machines that conquer them all.
